ctxs.title: RAG for NLP Tasks
ctxs.text: RAG models combine pre-trained parametric memory with non-parametric memory (dense vector index) for language generation, accessing external knowledge during inference.

data.output: Retrieval-Augmentation-to-Generation (RAG) [0] combines pre-trained parametric memory and dense vector index for language generation by retrieving relevant information from an external corpus during inference. The retrieved text is then fed into a generator model to produce the final output, allowing for more informative and context-rich responses.

reranked_ctxs.title: RAG for NLP Tasks
reranked_ctxs.text: RAG models combine pre-trained parametric memory with non-parametric memory (dense vector index) for language generation, accessing external knowledge during inference.
